Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends provisions relating to the mortgage recording tax in the county of Yates
Summary: Extends provisions relating to the mortgage recording tax in the county of Yates to December 1, 2023.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 366 of the laws of 2005, amending the tax law relating to the mortgage recording tax in the county of Yates, in relation to extending the provisions of such chapter
